title: Blue water challenge
creator_credit: Academy Film Productions and Ronald Mason
brief_description: A stimulating and accurate portrayal of the Golden Fleece Great Circle Yacht Race, which makes a clockwise circumnavigation of Tasmania. Starting off Portsea, Victoria, in January 1980, a fleet of Australia’s leading ocean racing yachts sailon a course of over 800 miles of challenging stretches of water. It has now become the longest race which starts and finishes in Australia. No other credits available.
